scripts.dev: concurrently -n FRONTEND,BACKEND -c cyan,green "npm run dev:frontend" "npm run dev:backend"
scripts.build: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:backend
scripts.start: concurrently -n FRONTEND,BACKEND -c cyan,green "npm --prefix ./frontend run preview" "npm --prefix ./backend run start"
scripts.typecheck: npm --prefix ./frontend run typecheck && npm --prefix ./backend run typecheck
